site_name: 1-5 Cromwell Place, 35-36 Thurloe Place, 3,4, 4A and 20 Thurloe Place Mews, LONDON, SW7
description: Creation of public entrance and wall on Thurloe Place. Erection of link lobby and glazed extension to rear of No. 1 Cromwell Place. Installation of sash window to No.1 Cromwell Place. Introduction of single door opening from Nos. 35-36 Thurloe Place into the courtyard. Creation of ancillary restaurant/bar at the ground floor of Nos. 4 and 5 Cromwell Place including the erection of a glazed extension to the rear and widening of the single entrance door. Creation of two openings to the dividing wall between Nos. 4 and 5 Cromwell Place. Installation of dumbwaiter and kitchen extract. Removal of non-original partition wall between the front and rear rooms of No. 5 Cromwell Place. Removal of partition wall to the lower ground floor of No. 4 Cromwell Place and the erection of partition walls to the front and rear rooms at lower ground floor of No.5 Cromwell Place. Creation of lobby areas in the entrance halls of Nos. 1, 2 and 3 Cromwell Place. New wayfinding strategy. Addition of traditional external retractable canopies, new external lighting, signage and associated works.
